settings.SiteHeader: The name that will be displayed on the website
settings.PodcastTitleImage: A filename in the output directory, typically xxx.jpg
settings.RssDescription: A short description of the podcast
settings.Author: The name of the podcast author
settings.AuthorMail: The e-mail address to the podcast author
settings.ItunesUrl: URL to iTunes (cannot be filled in until accepted at iTunes - leave blank for start)
settings.SpotifyUrl: URL to Spotify (cannot be filled in until accepted at Spotify - leave blank for start)
